CustomField.formula: IF(Largest_Gift__c < 50,"50", IF(Largest_Gift__c < 75,"75", IF(Largest_Gift__c < 100,"100", IF(Largest_Gift__c < 125,"125", IF(Largest_Gift__c < 150,"150", IF(Largest_Gift__c < 175,"175", IF(Largest_Gift__c < 200,"200", IF(Largest_Gift__c < 225,"225", IF(Largest_Gift__c < 250,"250", IF(Largest_Gift__c < 300,"300", IF(Largest_Gift__c < 350,"350", IF(Largest_Gift__c < 400,"400", IF(Largest_Gift__c < 450,"450", IF(Largest_Gift__c < 500,"500", IF(Largest_Gift__c < 600,"600", IF(Largest_Gift__c < 700,"700", IF(Largest_Gift__c < 800,"800", IF(Largest_Gift__c < 900,"900", IF(Largest_Gift__c < 1000,"1000", IF(Largest_Gift__c >= 1000,"1000", "50"))))))))))))))))))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used in SpringBoard to determine amounts shown to donor on donation pages.
CustomField.label: Default Gift Amount
